chapter.para: As &productname; is constantly developed and improved, new versions get released. You are strongly advised to upgrade to a supported release. These upgrades may involve manual intervention.

sect1.title: Upgrading from &productname; 1
sect1.para: &productname; 2 comes with &kube; 1.7, wich uses etcd version 3 as default storage backend. Therefor, after upgrading from &productname; 1 to version 2 or higher, you have to orchestrate the migration between etcd 2 and 3.
The orchestration will shutdown all etcd and kube-api services, perform the etcd migration steps, set the etcd_version = etcd3 pillar value, and start etc and kube-api back up.

important.title: Service Window Required
important.para: This migration can take a several minutes, during which etcd and kube-api services are unavailable. Please make sure to plan a service window.

step.screen: docker exec -ti $(docker ps | grep salt-master | cut -d" " -f1) \ salt-run state.orchestrate orch.etcd-migrate

sect1.para: After the command successfully finished, all services will be available again.
